Based on what you have mentioned about the movie "Alex in Wonderland", I would recommend watching this movie.
The movie "Alex in Wonderland" is a story that challenges modern conscience. The movie features an array of talented actors, including Angelo Rossitto, Jeanne Moreau, Paul Mazursky, and Ellen Burstyn.
In addition to featuring a talented cast, the movie also has a compelling plot. The movie tells the story of a man named Alex who just finished directing his first feature-length movie. In its previews, the movie is considered a critical, artistic, and surefire commercial success, so Alex seemingly has his choice of what his next project will be.
Alex has a few ideas, like a biopic of Lenny Bruce or a movie about a black uprising in Los Angeles. As he makes the rounds of both the Hollywood community and European movie centers for ideas, he fantasizes about movie scenarios of his everyday situations, influenced by his movie idols, some of whom he actually meets, like Italian director Federico Fellini
